Name: Ambidextrous
Content: All melee weapons in your gear grid gain paired. Ambidextrous cannot be used if there are any shields, two-handed, or heavy gear in your gear grid.

Name: Berserker
Content: Once per showdown, you may spend an activation (⚡) to suffer bash and frenzy brain trauma.

Name: Clutch Fighter
Content: While you have 3 or more blood tokens, gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy.

Name: Combo Master
Content: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack to roll.

Name: Crazed
Content: On a perfect hit, gain +1 insanity.

Name: Crossarm Block
Content: Whenever you are hit, after hit locations are rolled up, you may change 1 result to the arms hit location.

Name: Double Dash
Content: During your act, once per round, you may spend an activation (⚡) to gain a move (♞).

Name: Extra Sense
Content: You may dodge 1 additional time per round.

Name: King of a Thousand Battles
Content: Gain +2 accuracy, +2 strength, +2 evasion. You may dodge any number of times in a round. Only 1 survivor may have this Secret Fighting Art.

Name: King's Step
Content: Whenever you attack, you may discard any number of Battle Pressure hit locations drawn an equal number of new hit locations. Whenever you attack, after drawing hit locations, but before rolling to wound, you may choose one hit location drawn and discard it to draw a new hit location. Traps will cancel these effects.

Name: Last Man Standing
Content: While you are the only survivor on the showdown board, you may not gain bleeding tokens or be knocked down.

Name: Leader
Content: When you encourage a survivor, they gain +1 speed token until the end of the round.

Name: Legendary Lungs
Content: Once per attack, for each successful hit, make an additional attack roll.

Name: Mighty Strike
Content: On a perfect hit, gain +2 strength until the end of the attack.

Name: Monster Claw Style
Content: Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain +1 accuracy, +1 strength and savage.

Name: Orator of Death
Content: Once per showdown, you may spend an activation (⚡) to have all non-deaf survivors gain +2 insanity. When you die, you encourage all survivors with your last words.

Name: Red Fist
Content: At the start of each showdown, each survivor gains +1 strength token. Survivors may spend +1 strength tokens in place of survival.

Name: Rythm Chaser
Content: Gain +1 evasion token the first time you critically wound during a showdown. Rhythm Chaser cannot be used if there are any shields or heavy gear in your grid.

Name: Strategist
Content: During the showdown setup, after placing terrain, you may add a Giant Stone Face or a Toppled Pillar terrain card to the showdown board.

Name: Swordsman's Promise
Content: At the start of each showdown, gain survival up to your settlement's survival limit if you have a sword in your gear grid.

Name: Thrill Seeker
Content: Whenever you gain survival during the showdown phase, gain 1 additional survival.

Name: Timeless Eye
Content: Your attack roll is a perfect hit on a result of 9 or 10. You cannot use Timeless Eye if you have the blind sever head injury.

Name: Tough
Content: When rolling on a severe injury table, unless you roll a 1, add +1 to the result. (This does not include brain trauma. The result total cannot exceed 10.)

Name: Tumble
Content: When something would collide with you, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you successfully tumble out of harm's way. Instead, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.

Name: Unconscious Fighter
Content: It takes 7 bleeding tokens to kill you.

Name: Zero Presence
Content: Gain +1 strength when attacking a monster from its blind spot. Whenever you attack a monster, you are always considered to be in its blind spot.

Name: Zero Presence
Content: Gain +1 strength when attacking a monster from its blind spot. Whenever you attack a monster, you are always considered to be in its blind spot.

Name: Altered Destiny
Content: If you would gain a negative attribute token, gain a positive attribute token of that type instead.

Name: Beetle Strength
Content: Once per showdown, you may spend (⚡) to shove an adjacent obstacle terrain. if you do, move the terrain directly away from you in a straight line until it encounters a board edge or another obstacle terrain. Any monsters the terrain passes over suffer a wound, and any survivors it collides with suffer knockback 7. The display of strength is so exhausting it ages you. You are knocked down and gain +1 Hunt XP.

Name: Carapace of Will
Content: At the start of the showdown, gain the Steadfast survivor status card. When you are attacked, if you have 2+ steadfast tokens, ignore a hit and remove all your steadfast tokens.

Name: Propulsion Drive
Content: At the start of the showdown, gain the Momentum survivor status card. When you attack, if you have 5+ momentum tokens, remove them all and roll 1d10. Gain that amount of luck and strength when attemption to wound the first selected hit location for this attack.

Name: Acanthus Doctor
Content: You may wear up to 3 Satchel gear cards. When you depart, if you are not wearing any armor, for each ◼ green affinity you have, gain +1 strength token and add 1⛊ to all hit locations. Spend your activation and a Flower or Fresh Acanthus resource to heal a permanent injury you or an adjacent survivor suffered this showdown.

Name: Fencing
Content: Ignore Parry when attempting to wound hit locations. (Attempt to wound these locations normally.) When a monster attacks you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, ignore 1 hit. Limit, once per round.

Name: Otherwordly Luck
Content: During the Hunt and Settlement phase, whenever you roll on a table, you may add +1 to the roll result. This may not exceed the highest possible result of that table. (This includes Hunt Events, Story Events, Endeavors, Settlement Events, etc.)

Name: True Blade
Content: All swords in your gear grid gain deadly. Gain +3 luck when attacking with a sword if you have the Ghostly Beauty and Narcissistic disorders.

Name: Immovable Object
Content: If you are on an unoccupied space, you stand firm in the face of any force. You cannot be knocked down and may ignore knockback. (If you occupy the same space as a monster, impassable terrain rile, or another survivor, you are knocked down and suffer knockback.)

Name: Lure Epilepsy
Content: Once per showdown, you may spend (⚡) to give yourself a seizure. You suffer a random brain trauma and are knocked down.

Name: Mammoth Hunting
Content: Gain +1 strength when attacking from adjacent spaces outside the monster's facing and blind spot.

Name: Burning Focus
Content: If you have 0 survival at the start of your act, gain 1 survival.

Name: Heroic
Content: Once per showdown, if you are standing adjacent to the monster and have 3+ survival, you may spend all of your survival for one automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.

Name: Necromancer
Content: When you depart, gain +1⛊ to all hit locations for each gear card in your grid with the symbol keyword. If you would roll on the severe injury table, roll on the Worm Trauma table instead. When you die or forget this, the settlement gains the Knowledge Worm Innovation.

Name: Ruthless
Content: Whenever a survivor dies during the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain a Skull basic resource.

Name: Unrelenting
Content: If all of your attack rolls in an attack miss, you may spend 1 survival to re-roll all attack rolls.

Name: Ageless Apprentice
Content: When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it. When you depart, you may rotate up to 3 gear cards in your gear grid. This changes the location of their affinities and arrows. Otherwise, the gear functions normally.

Name: Costly Screenwriter
Content: At the start of the showdown, secretly write down on a scrap of paper which survivors will live and who will deal the killing blow. During the aftermath, if your predictions were correct, raise the settlement's Survival Limit by 1.

Name: Headliner
Content: When you become doomed or gain the priority target token, you may choose to gain +1 survival or +1 strength token.

Name: Tenacious
Content: When your wound attempt on a hit location is a failure, you may puty that hit location back on top of the deck instead of the discard pile. Limit, once per round.

Name: Wardrobe Expert
Content: When you suffer a severe injury at a hit location, you may archive a gear worn at that location to ignore it and gain +1 survival.

Name: Abyssal Sadist
Content: The first time you wound the monster each attack, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity. Ignore the effects of the Fear of the Dark and Prey disorders.

Name: Eternal Will
Content: Gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength for each permanent injury you have. You may always depart, even when retired.

Name: Seasoned Hunter
Content: Whenever a random hunt event result is: 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99, or 100, the event revealer gains +1 understanding and +1 courage.

Name: Trailblazer
Content: The hunting party may start the hunt phase 1 space closer to the monster. At the start of the showdown, all survivors gain +1 survival and up to +1 insanity.

Name: Transcended Masochist
Content: When you gain a bleeding token, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity. Ignore the effects of the Aichophobia and Apathetic disorders.

Name: Blotted Out
Content: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain a bleeding token.

Name: Clarity of Darkness
Content: At the start of the showdown, gain the Path of Gloom survivor status card. There is a deadly, otherwordly presence about you. Other survivors cannot voluntarily end their movement adjacent to you.

Name: Phantom Friend
Content: The first time you gain a resource during a showdown, you may feed it to your phantom friend. If you do, archive the resource and gain +1 evasion tokne. Lose this token if you are deaf or become deaf during the showdown.

Name: Death Touch
Content: Gain +1 accuracy when attack with Fist & Tooth. When you wound a monster, it gains -1 toughness until the end of your attack. You cannot use this if you are male.

Name: Harvestman
Content: Gain +3 movement. Whenever you are knocked down, gain -1 movement token. If you have the Tiny Arachnophobia disorder, you are too scared of spiders to imitate them and you cannot use this fighting art.

Name: Silk Surgeon
Content: ⓿: None. ❶: You may spend (⚡) while adjacent to another survivor to add 2⛊ to one of their hit locations. ❷: While all armor in your gear grid is silk and all jewelry is amber, gain +2 evasion. ❸: During the aftermath, roll 1d10 for each other survivor that died during the showdown. On a 7+, revive them.

Name: Vengeance
Content: When a survivor dies during the showdown, gain +4 survival and +1 strength token.

Name: Burning Ambition
Content: When you are instructed to Skip the Next Hunt, ignore it. The "Skip Next Hunt" box on your survivor record sheet cannot be filled in.

Name: Defender
Content: When a survivor adjacent to you is knocked down, you may spend 1 survival. If you do, they stand and gain +1 survival from your words of encouragement. You cannot use this if you have a broken jaw.

Name: Hellfire
Content: You cannot lose or remove this fighting art. Gain +1 strength for each ◼ red affinity you have. You cannot be nominated for Intimacy. You ignore Extreme Heat. At the start of your act, if your survival is 0 or you have any +1 strength tokens, your organs cook themselves and you die.

Name: Purpose
Content: Your comrades make you strong enough to exceed the limits of death itself. During the showdown, if you would gain a lethal number of bleeding tokens while there are any other standing survivors, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you live but are knocked down. You will not bleed to death until you gain another bleeding token.

Name: Sneak Attack
Content: When you attack a monster from its blind spot, gain +4 strength for that attack.

Name: Sun Eater
Content: Your body mysteriously absobs light. At the start of the showdown, gain survival up to the settlement's Survival Limit. If you have any +1 strength tokens, you may spend them all to perform the Surge survival action (following all of its normal rules and restrictions).

Name: Suppressed Shadow
Content: You no longer cast a shadow and you never hesitate. Ignore First Strike. On a Perfect Hit, your first wound attempt of the attack automatically succeeds and inflicts a critical wound. If you die during the showdown, place a Shade minion in the space you occupied.

Name: Trick Attack
Content: Once per showdown, when you wound a monster from its blind spot, a survivor adjacent to you may gain the priority target token.

Name: Acrobatics
Content: When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend (♞) to place your survivor on any other space adjacent to the monster.

Name: Champion's Rite
Content: Before making an attack, you may add your understanding to your accuracy attribute for that attack. Limit, once per showdown.

Name: Fated Blow
Content: Once per showdown, you may give your next wound attempt +2 strength and Devastating 1.

Name: Frozen Star
Content: Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a monster's brain. They gain -2 accuracy until the end of the round. Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a survivor's brain, killing them instantly. They die.

Name: Unbreakable
Content: Once per lantern year, you may ignore once of your severe injury roll results. If you do, gain a random disorder.
